The fake news article and meme originate: specifically "Fox News the FB Page" and its associated website www.tdalliance.com.
In reality: Vice President Pence publicly stated that he was "appalled" when he learned of the domestic abuse allegations against Porter and did not know about them until Porter's resignation.
The article misquoted Pence: falsely attributing statements to him that he never made regarding Porter's actions being in accordance with Biblical principles and women submitting to their husbands.
